block.p: Elisabeth Ancona Gold, the daughter of Lana Walder of Short Hills, N.J., and Stewart Gold of Owings Mills, Md., was married last evening to Scott Philip Domansky, the son of Paula and Martin Domansky of Roslyn, N.Y. Rabbi Marc Schneier officiated at the Plaza in New York.

Mrs. Domansky, 28, is a marketing director at Polo Ralph Lauren in New York. She graduated from Tulane University. Her father is the chief executive of Intermedia, a company in Owings Mills that makes transactional software for sales terminals in supermarkets, restaurants and other retail locations. Her mother is the associate vice president for sales in the New Providence, N.J., office of the W. B. Wood Company, office furniture dealers. The bride is the stepdaughter of Justin P. Walder.

Elisabeth Ancona Gold, the daughter of Lana Walder of Short Hills, N.J., and Stewart Gold of Owings Mills, Md., was married last evening to Scott Philip Domansky, the son of Paula and Martin Domansky of Roslyn, N.Y. Rabbi Marc Schneier officiated at the Plaza in New York.

Mrs. Domansky, 28, is a marketing director at Polo Ralph Lauren in New York. She graduated from Tulane University. Her father is the chief executive of Intermedia, a company in Owings Mills that makes transactional software for sales terminals in supermarkets, restaurants and other retail locations. Her mother is the associate vice president for sales in the New Providence, N.J., office of the W. B. Wood Company, office furniture dealers. The bride is the stepdaughter of Justin P. Walder.
Mr. Domansky, also 28, is the vice president of PRD Realty in New York, a development and management company, of which his father is the president. The bridegroom graduated from Boston University.
